an4.22:1.4: netaṃ → metaṃ (si, s1-3, km, mr) | ne (pts1)
an4.22:2.2: nayime → na vatime (bj) | nacayime (s1-3, km) | na vata me (pts1)
an4.22:4.4: sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ → sātthā sabyañjanā (bj) | sātthā savyañjanā (pts1), kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ → kevalaparipuṇṇā (bj), dhātā → dhatā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
an4.22:6.3: Saññato dhīro dhammesu → saññato dhīradhammesu (bj) | saṃyutto thiradhammesu (s1-3, km)
